body: Too bad it had exhibitionism it would be better without it.
Yo holy fucking shit the comment below Dragonia is long 🤯

This may be nice and all, but what bothers me is that they, for whom reside within a naval vessel (one fitted for combat by the looks of it), deemed it necessary to keep on board water guns with the structural capability of shooting something with the density of... an aphrodisiac lotion. I can accept that they would keep regular water guns on board, as I would expect from a high school based anime, but to have to go through the effort of making them strong enough as to effectively fire goop with considerable range and pressure through a freaking pin hole designed for a liquid known for it's tendency to go though tiny gaps. AND EVEN THEN, water is hard enough to get though those things with even the slightest amount of accuracy, so either they made a huge mess with those outside of the intended target zone or specifically designed them to use some kind of pressurization mechanism, further making a point to the amount of useless effort they're putting towards their government decisions
well ya gotta do something at sea to get rid of the stress lmao
